name: City Commando Simulator
description:
City Commando Simulator

This 3D Shooter sensation will blow your mind with sharpshooting commando action! You are a special unit infantry soldier in this marauding adventure. YOU fight against urban terrorists, secret agents, and assassins to purge the city from evil. It’s time to show off your sniper skills and shoot criminals thugs before they do serious damage. You won’t have much time to hide after your first shot! Sharpen your tactics and field strategy!

Commando Simulator 3D gives you the chance to become everyone's hero by fighting brutal gangsters in amazing 3D environments. Each mission completion earns you gold which you can use to unlock and upgrade your weaponry for maximum effectiveness. Choose your best gun, protect yourself with bulletproof armor, and keep health kits close at hand as it’s going to be bloody, gruesome, combat warfare!

Commando Simulator 3D Features:
•Awesome 3D graphics.
•Realistic ballistics effects.
•Smooth, easy, and addictive game play.
•18 missions for maximum thrill.
•Complex situations, heavy firing, bomb blasting & attack missions.
•Many of weapons to choose from including UMPz, MP6, 9MM, ScorpionZ, Vz7 etc.
•Upgradeable features for maximum effect!
•Thrilling missions to select!
